author: scottbw
msg: Updated the set of W3C Widget Interface test cases to the current suite.

author: scottbw
msg: Fixed a mistake in the JPA implementation of the Author property of a Widget that could lead to an erratic problem with object consistency when uploading losts of widgets at the same time.

author: markt
msg: Fix problem with Lifecycle re-factoring for deprecated embedded class that prevented events being triggered.
